committee.name: Rules
committee.notes: This meeting will be called off the floor.||ALL BILLS REPORT DIRECT TO THIRD READING

bill.title: An act to amend the social services law, in relation to investigation of illegally operating child day care services

An act to amend the social services law, in relation to additional options for local social services districts to implement effective welfare-to-work programs; and to repeal section 341 of such law relating thereto
